object.name: InlineKeyboardMarkup
object.description:
This object represents an inline keyboard that appears right next to the message it belongs to.
Note: This will only work in Telegram versions released after 9 April, 2016. Older clients will display unsupported message.
object.html_description:
This object represents an inline keyboard that appears right next to the message it belongs to.

Note: This will only work in Telegram versions released after 9 April, 2016. Older clients will display unsupported message.
object.rst_description:
This object represents an `inline keyboard <https://core.telegram.org/bots/features#inline-keyboards>`_ that appears right next to the message it belongs to.
**Note:** This will only work in Telegram versions released after 9 April, 2016. Older clients will display *unsupported message*.

annotations.description: Array of button rows, each represented by an Array of InlineKeyboardButton objects
annotations.html_description: Array of button rows, each represented by an Array of InlineKeyboardButton objects
annotations.rst_description: Array of button rows, each represented by an Array of :class:`aiogram.types.inline_keyboard_button.InlineKeyboardButton` objects
annotations.name: inline_keyboard
